result.purpose: This folder is responsible for containing unit tests for various repository functionalities within the application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on unit testing individual repository components to ensure their correctness and reliability.

tests/repositories/crawled_data_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the CrawledDataRepository in the repositories package.

tests/repositories/game_played_logs_test.purpose: Unit tests for the GamePlayedLogs repository functionality.

tests/repositories/purchase_history_logs.purpose: Unit tests for the PurchaseHistoryLogsRepository's UpsertBatch function.

tests/repositories/quest_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the QuestRepository in the repositories package.
